translation.en: ♪ First thing we'd climb a tree ♪
♪ And maybe then we'd talk ♪
♪ And listen to our thoughts ♪
♪ No dress rehearsal ♪
♪ This is our life ♪
translation.ko: "거창한 단어를 써야 한다" "달빛 아래 나무에서 자기"

translation.en: You'll want to hurry and eat if you're to meet the train on time.
translation.ko: 기차 시간에 늦지 않으려면 서둘러 식사해야 해

translation.en: [sighs] I pray this isn't foolishness, but it's too late now.
translation.ko: 바보 같은 결정이 아니어야 할 텐데 어쨌든 이제 늦었지

translation.en: We made a practical decision. We'll just have to hope for the best.
With any luck, Mrs. Spencer will have picked out a good one.
translation.ko: 운이 따라준다면 스펜서 부인이 잘 골랐겠지

translation.en: A hard worker and obedient, like we asked for.
translation.ko: 부지런하고 말 잘 듣는 애로 말이야

translation.en: I couldn't tolerate a lazy boy or a sullen boy.
translation.ko: 게으르고 뚱한 남자애는 절대 안 돼

translation.en: No, I couldn't abide it and I wouldn't.
translation.ko: 게으르고 뚱한 남자애는 절대 안 돼 그건 절대 못 참아 참지도 않을 테지만

translation.en: In spite of all the worry, I'm relieved to know you'll have a regular hand about the place.
translation.ko: 염려가 되기는 하지만 일손이 생겨서 다행이야

translation.en: You can't buy loyalty.
You coming in sometime today?
translation.ko: 오늘 내로 식사하러 들어오기는 할 거야?

translation.en: Matthew Cuthbert, you must be in a state.
translation.ko: 매슈 커스버트 정신이 없기는 한가 보군

translation.en: Since when do you sit at the table without washing your hands?
translation.ko: 식사 전에 손 씻는 것도 잊어버리다니

translation.en: Let's not forget you were the one convinced of this plan.
translation.ko: 이번 일은 네가 확신을 가진 일이잖아

translation.en: You've been set on it since winter, so there's no point fretting now.
translation.ko: 지난겨울부터 마음먹은 일인데 이제 와서 초조해할 것 없어

translation.en: Not that I disagree, because I don't.
translation.ko: 반대하는 건 아니야 확실히 반대는 안 해

translation.en: Will you be ready to set off as soon as you're finished here?
I will.
Bet it won't take long for Rachel to come a-knocking.
Lord knows she's got a hunger for gossip like a person starved.
I told you to have their supper on the table a half-hour ago.
-She needs her diaper changed. -Did you milk the cow?
translation.ko: 기저귀를 갈아야 해서요 - 스튜는 거의... - 소젖은 다 짰어?

translation.en: -No. Not yet, but I-- -Give her to me!
You want these children to starve to death? Do something right for a change.
translation.ko: 애들을 다 굶겨 죽일 거야? 뭐라도 제대로 좀 해

translation.en: You're more trouble than you're worth. Nothing but a miserable piece of trash!
translation.ko: 뭐 하나 제대로 하는 것 없이 아무짝에도 쓸모가 없다니까

translation.en: Hurry up! We'll see what Mr. Hammond has to say about this when he gets home.
translation.ko: 빨리해 남편이 오면 이걸 보고 뭐라고 할지 두고 보자

translation.en: Are you quite all right, dear?
I like imagining better than remembering.
translation.ko: 저는 기억하는 것보다 상상하는 게 더 좋아요

translation.en: Why are the worst memories the most insistent?
translation.ko: 왜 끔찍한 기억이 제일 오래 갈까요?

translation.en: I wouldn't know. Try to rest.
"If all the world hated you, and believed you wicked...
translation.ko: '온 세상이 너를 싫어하고 너를 사악하게 여긴다 해도'

translation.en: but your own conscience approved of you and absolved you from guilt...
translation.ko: '네 양심에 거리낄 게 없고 죄가 없다면'

translation.en: you would not be without friends."
I love Jane Eyre, don't you?
I never met her.
I'm glad you've woken. I have so many more questions for you about Green Gables.
translation.ko: 잠에서 깨셔서 다행이에요 초록지붕집에 대해 궁금한 게 정말 많거든요

translation.en: I'm sure you do.
Why do you suppose neither of the Cuthberts ever married?
translation.ko: 왜 두 분 모두 결혼을 안 하셨을까요?

translation.en: Did either of them have a tragical romance?
-It's none of our business. -But I'm bursting with curiosity!
translation.ko: - 우리가 알 바 아니야 - 호기심에 안달이 나요

translation.en: Afternoon.
Sir.
I was wondering if you could, uh, help me. [stammers] Is there, um--?
translation.ko: 뭐 좀 물어봐도 될까요? - 혹시... - 여자애요?

translation.en: A little girl? You didn't see her? She's just outside.
translation.ko: - 혹시... - 여자애요? 못 봤어요? 바로 밖에 있는데

translation.en: Wouldn't come in. Darndest thing.
But--
Said she preferred to sit outside because there was... What was it now?
translation.ko: - 하지만... - 밖에 앉아 있겠다더군요 그렇지만... 뭐라더라?

translation.en: "More scope for the imagination." That was it.
She's a case, I should say. I heard her talking to herself out there.
translation.ko: 혼자 얘기하는 걸 들었는데 정말 괴짜더군요

translation.en: But I-I'm not expecting a girl.
It's a boy that I have come for.
Mrs. Spencer was to bring him over from the asylum.
translation.ko: 스펜서 부인이 보육원에서 남자애를 데리고 오기로 했어요

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Spencer got off the train with that strange snippet.
translation.ko: 스펜서 부인이 저 희한한 애를 데리고 내려서

translation.en: Gave her into my charge. Said you'd be along for her presently.
translation.ko: 내게 맡기고는 댁이 곧 애를 데리러 올 거라더군요

translation.en: Well, that's all I know about it.
I haven't got any more orphans concealed hereabouts.
I don't understand.
Well, I'm sure the girl will be only too happy
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 건지는 저 애가 기쁜 마음으로

translation.en: to tell you every little detail of what happened.
[chuckles] She's got a tongue of her own, that's for certain.
Good day to you.
I suppose you are Matthew Cuthbert of Green Gables?
translation.ko: 초록지붕집에서 오신 매슈 커스버트 씨 맞죠?

translation.en: I'm very glad to see you. I was beginning to be afraid you weren't coming,
translation.ko: 만나 봬서 기뻐요 안 오시나 걱정했거든요

translation.en: and I was imagining all the things that might've happened to prevent you.
I'd made up my mind that if you didn't come for me,
I'd go down the track to that big wild cherry tree,
and climb up into it and stay all night.
I wouldn't be a bit afraid, and it would be lovely to sleep in a tree
translation.ko: 나무 위에서 자는 건 무섭기는커녕 멋질 거예요

translation.en: white with bloom in the moonshine, don't you think?
translation.ko: 달빛 아래에서 하얀 꽃과 함께요, 그렇죠?

translation.en: I can also imagine that I'm already a disappointment to you.
I'm aware that I'm not much to look at, but even though I'm thin, I'm very strong.
translation.ko: 제가 볼품없는 것도 알아요 비쩍 마르긴 했어도 힘은 세요

translation.en: I want you to know that I'm forever grateful that you're adopting me.
translation.ko: 저를 입양해주신 거 감사하다는 말씀 드리고 싶어요

translation.en: You're a sight for sore eyes, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation.ko: 이리 뵙게 돼 큰 기쁨입니다, 아저씨

translation.en: You best come along.
-Uh, I'll take your bag. -Oh, I can carry it.
translation.ko: - 가방 이리 다오 - 제가 들 수 있어요

translation.en: It isn't heavy.
I've got all my worldly goods in it, but it isn't heavy.
translation.ko: 소지품을 다 넣었는데도 하나도 안 무거워요

translation.en: And if it isn't carried a certain way,
translation.ko: 거기다 잘못 들면 바로 열려버리기 때문에

translation.en: it falls right open, so I'd better keep it.
translation.ko: 거기다 잘못 들면 바로 열려버리기 때문에 요령을 잘 알고 있는 제가 들어야 해요

translation.en: I've come to know the exact knack of it.
translation.ko: 요령을 잘 알고 있는 제가 들어야 해요

translation.en: I am ecstatic beyond measure
that I'm going to belong to you and your sister.
Ecstatic. I've never belonged to anybody before.
translation.ko: 황홀하다고요 저는 가족을 가져본 적이 한 번도 없거든요

translation.en: I mean, you and your sister are practically the stuff of fiction.
translation.ko: 아저씨랑 아주머니는 진짜 소설에나 나올 분들이죠

translation.en: Two hard-working decent people, lonely all their lives
translation.ko: 성실하고 점잖은 두 분이 적막한 집에서 아이의 사랑을 그리며

translation.en: in their silent house, longing for the love of a child.
translation.ko: 적막한 집에서 아이의 사랑을 그리며 외롭게 사신 거잖아요

translation.en: And I will strive to be just the best daughter that anybody could ever have.
translation.ko: 어느 누구의 딸보다 훌륭한 딸이 되도록 최선의 노력을 다할 거예요

translation.en: I'm sure that I could do it.
To be honest, I haven't had much experience at it.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말씀드리면 아직 경험은 별로 없지만요

translation.en: I'm not usually brought into the house to be a daughter, so...
translation.ko: 보통은 딸로 삼으려고 저를 데려간 게 아니었거든요

translation.en: you can well imagine what a blessing this is, and how much my heart is lifted.
translation.ko: 이게 얼마나 큰 축복이고 제가 얼마나 기쁜지 충분히 이해하실 거예요

translation.en: And I've given it a lot of thought,
and I am determined that I shall be obedient and dutiful,
and yet, yet lively enough so as to lighten up the place,
translation.ko: 집안 분위기를 환하게 하는 생기발랄한 딸이 되기로 했죠

translation.en: after you've lived for so many years
translation.ko: 행복한 아이를 보는 기쁨과 아이다운 상상력 없이

translation.en: without the delights of a happy child and the scope of her imagination.
translation.ko: 행복한 아이를 보는 기쁨과 아이다운 상상력 없이 너무 오래 지내셨잖아요

translation.en: Have you always wanted a daughter?
Always in your heart of hearts?
I read once that a daughter is a little girl who grows up to be a friend.
translation.ko: 딸은 자라서 친구가 된다는 걸 언젠가 읽은 적이 있어요

translation.en: And it, it gives my heart a thrill to even say it aloud.
translation.ko: 크게 소리 내 말하기만 해도 가슴이 뛰어요

translation.en: Oh, isn't she lovely?
-What's her name? -Uh...
That's, um... Mare.
She doesn't have a name?
But the right name is so important.
She looks to me like her name is Belle.
Hello, Belle. You are a beauty, and I am sure we'll be great friends.
translation.ko: 벨, 정말 예쁘구나 우리는 좋은 친구가 될 거야

translation.en: Mare... [clicks tongue]
Bye, tree!
That cherry tree is my first friend here on the island.
translation.ko: 저 벚나무는 이 섬에서 사귄 첫 친구예요

translation.en: What did that cherry tree, all white and lacy, make you think of?
translation.ko: 순백의 레이스 같은 저 나무요 뭔가 떠오르지 않아요?

translation.en: Well, now, um... I dunno.
[Anne] Why, a bride, of course. A bride all in white with a misty veil.
I've never seen one, but I imagine what she would look like.
translation.ko: 한 번도 본 적은 없지만 그럴 거라고 상상해봤거든요

translation.en: I never expect to be a bride myself. I'm so homely.
translation.ko: 저는 절대 그런 신부가 못 될 거예요 이렇게 못생겼는데 누가 결혼하고 싶겠어요

translation.en: Nobody would ever want to marry me.
Unless he was a foreign missionary.
I suppose a foreign missionary mightn't be very particular.
translation.ko: 외국 선교사는 취향이 특이할 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: But I do hope someday I shall have a white dress with beautiful puff sleeves.
translation.ko: 언젠간 저도 퍼프 소매가 달린 예쁜 흰 드레스를 입고 싶어요

translation.en: That is my highest ideal of earthly bliss.
Am I talking too much?
People are always telling me that I do, and it seems to cause aggravation.
translation.ko: 다들 제가 말이 많다더군요 그게 항상 상황을 악화시키고요

translation.en: Would you rather I didn't talk? If you say so, I'll stop.
I can stop when I make up my mind to it, although it's difficult.
translation.ko: 어렵기는 해도 마음만 먹으면 할 수 있거든요

translation.en: I don't mind.
I'm so glad.
I know that you and I are gonna get along together just fine.
translation.ko: 아저씨랑 잘 지낼 수 있을 것 같아요

translation.en: It's such a relief to talk when one wants to
translation.ko: 말하고 싶을 때 할 수 있어서 얼마나 다행인지 몰라요

translation.en: and not be told that children should be seen and not heard.
translation.ko: 얼쩡거리거나 소리 내면 안 된다는 말도 안 듣고요

translation.en: I've had that said to me a million times if I have once.
translation.ko: 그런 말을 귀에 못이 박이도록 들었거든요

translation.en: People would laugh at me because I use big words, but...
translation.ko: 제가 어려운 단어를 쓰면 사람들이 비웃죠

translation.en: but they're exciting and descriptive words, like...
translation.ko: 하지만 흥미진진하고 표현이 풍부한 단어가 많거든요

translation.en: like "enraptured" and "glorious."
If you have big ideas, you have to use big words to express them, haven't you?
translation.ko: 거창한 생각을 표현하려면 거기에 걸맞은 거창한 단어를 써야 하잖아요

translation.en: Well... I suppose so.
For example...
I am enraptured by this glorious landscape!
Just careful now. Careful.
[Marilla] Afternoon, Rachel. I've put the kettle on.
Won't you sit down?
I don't want to interrupt if you're expecting company.
translation.ko: 기다리는 사람이 있나 본데 방해하고 싶지는 않아

translation.en: Oh, we've got plenty of time. Matthew won't be back for several hours.
translation.ko: 시간 많아, 매슈는 몇 시간 더 있어야 돌아올 거야

translation.en: I took quite a fright when I saw Matthew starting off today.
translation.ko: 매슈가 나가는 거 보고 걱정이 돼서 말이야

translation.en: I can imagine.
Well, I couldn't imagine what might cause him
translation.ko: 무슨 일인가 싶더라니까 매슈가 일하다 말고 도대체 어디 가는지 말이야

translation.en: to leave his crop in the middle of the afternoon.
translation.ko: 매슈가 일하다 말고 도대체 어디 가는지 말이야

translation.en: I was fearful he'd gone to call for the doctor.
translation.ko: 의사라도 데리러 가나 해서 어찌나 걱정이 되던지...

translation.en: -Oh, I'm quite well. -Oh, what a relief.
[exhales] 'Course, now that I have time to think...
it wouldn't make sense for Matthew to take the time to put on his best set of clothes
translation.ko: 매슈가 그렇게 옷을 빼입을 시간은 없었겠지 위급 상황이었다면 말이야

translation.en: had there been an emergency.
translation.ko: 옷을 빼입을 시간은 없었겠지 위급 상황이었다면 말이야

translation.en: No. It wouldn't.
No, indeed.
[clicks tongue] Oh, for heaven's sake, Marilla.
Matthew's gone to the train station at Bright River.
[exhales] Well, well. Bright River.
He's fetching a hired hand?
Yes and no.
We're adopting a boy from the orphan asylum in Nova Scotia,
and he's arriving today.
-Matthew's gone to fetch him. -Marilla Cuthbert,
if you had told me that Matthew was meeting a... kangaroo from Australia,
translation.ko: 매슈가 호주에서 온 캥거루를 만나러 갔다고 해도

translation.en: I couldn't be more surprised.
translation.ko: 내가 이 정도로 놀라지는 않았을 거야

translation.en: An orphan boy?
What on earth put such a notion into your head?
Because I'm gonna tell you plain...
translation.ko: 그냥 솔직히 얘기할게 말도 안 되는 짓을 저질렀어

translation.en: you're doing a mighty foolish thing, a risky thing, that's what.
translation.ko: 그냥 솔직히 얘기할게 말도 안 되는 짓을 저질렀어 위험한 일이지 그렇다니까

translation.en: [Anne] I cannot believe that I'm going to get to live somewhere so beautiful.
translation.ko: 이렇게 아름다운 곳에서 살게 되다니 꿈만 같아요

translation.en: Dreams don't often come true, do they?
But just now I feel pretty nearly perfectly happy.
translation.ko: 그런데 저는 지금 완벽에 가깝게 행복하거든요

translation.en: Although I can't feel exactly perfectly happy because, well...
what color would you call this?
It's red, isn't it?
Yes, it's red.
Now you see why I can't be perfectly happy.
translation.ko: 이제 왜 제가 완벽하게 행복할 수 없는지 아시겠죠

translation.en: Nobody could who has red hair. It's...
translation.ko: 빨간 머리는 절대 행복할 수 없거든요 이건...

translation.en: my lifelong sorrow.
You don't know what you're getting.
translation.ko: 무슨 일을 벌인 건지 알아? 너는 지금...

translation.en: You're letting a... strange child into your house,
translation.ko: 무슨 일을 벌인 건지 알아? 너는 지금... 전혀 모르는 애를 집에 들이는 거잖아

translation.en: and you don't know a thing about him.
translation.ko: 전혀 모르는 애를 집에 들이는 거잖아

translation.en: Why, only last week, I was reading in the paper
translation.ko: 바로 지난주에 신문을 읽었는데 서부에 사는 부부가

translation.en: how a man and his wife, uh, up west of the island,
translation.ko: 신문을 읽었는데 서부에 사는 부부가 고아 남자애 하나를 집에 들였는데

translation.en: took an orphan boy out of the asylum,
and he set fire to their home. At night.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 걔가 한밤중에 집에 불을 질렀대

translation.en: Set it on purpose, Marilla.
And they nearly burnt to a crisp in their beds!
translation.ko: 그 사람들은 침대에서 타 죽을 뻔했어

translation.en: Now, if you would have asked for my advice on this matter,
translation.ko: 일 저지르기 전에 나한테 물어보지 그랬어

translation.en: -which you didn't do-- -Sugar?
I would have told you for mercy's sake not to think of such a thing, that's what!
translation.ko: 그런 건 생각도 하지 말라고 뜯어말렸을 거야 암, 그렇고말고

translation.en: I don't deny there's something in what you say, Rachel. I've...
translation.ko: 네 말처럼 꺼림칙한 게 있다는 걸

translation.en: I've had some qualms myself.
How could you not?
Matthew is getting on in years, and his heart's been bothering him.
translation.ko: 매슈도 나이가 들고 심장도 좋지 않아

translation.en: A boy will be a great help.
It isn't as if he's coming from overseas or the States. He's from Nova Scotia.
Can't be much different than ourselves.
Well, there is some comfort in that,
knowing he's not some London street Arab.
Or some French ruffian.
An orphan, Marilla.
Matthew's been terrible set on it.
Well, I only hope and pray it works all right.
Only don't say I didn't warn you if he burns Green Gables down,
translation.ko: 걔가 집에 불을 지르거나 우물에 독약을 타더라도

translation.en: or puts strychnine in the well.
I heard of a case over in New Brunswick
where an orphan asylum child did just that,
and the whole family died in fearful agonies.
translation.ko: 가족 모두가 끔찍한 고통 속에서 죽었대

translation.en: Only it was a girl in that instant. Well, we're not getting a girl.
translation.ko: - 그 사건은 여자애였지만 - 우린 여자애 안 들여

translation.en: [Anne] Oh, Mr. Cuthbert!
-What do they call this place? -The Avenue.
translation.ko: 아저씨 여기를 뭐라고 불러요? 애비뉴라고 해

translation.en: I suppose it is kind of pretty.
Oh, "pretty" doesn't seem the right word to use. Nor "beautiful," either.
They don't go far enough.
It's... wonderful.
Wonderful.
The first thing I ever saw that couldn't be improved upon by the imagination.
translation.ko: 제 상상력으로 멋지게 만들 필요가 없는 곳은 처음 봤어요

translation.en: Other people may call it "The Avenue,"
translation.ko: 다들 애비뉴라고 부르겠지만 저는 앞으로 이곳을...

translation.en: but I shall always call it "the White Way of Delight."
translation.ko: 다들 애비뉴라고 부르겠지만 저는 앞으로 이곳을... 환희의 하얀 길이라고 부를래요

translation.en: [Matthew] This here is Barry's Pond.
[Anne] I don't like that name, either.
I shall call it...
let me see...
"the Lake of Shining Waters."
Yes, that's the right name for it.
I-I know because of the thrill. Do things ever give you a thrill?
translation.ko: 전율이 오는 걸 보니 맞아요 전율을 느끼는 게 있으세요?

translation.en: Uh, I don't rightly know.
There has to be something.
Well, now, um... [clicks tongue]
I suppose it kind of gives me a thrill
translation.ko: 오이밭을 일구다가 징그러운 하얀 땅벌레를 보면

translation.en: to see those ugly white grubs spade up in the cucumber beds.
translation.ko: 오이밭을 일구다가 징그러운 하얀 땅벌레를 보면 전율이 느껴진다고 할 수 있지

translation.en: Well, I suppose I can imagine that.
I hate the look of them, and like to be rid of them.
I suppose I gave Mrs. Hammond a thrill, then.
translation.ko: 저는 해먼드 부인에게 전율을 느끼게 한 것 같아요

translation.en: She was happy to be rid of me after her husband died.
Who's Mrs. Hammond?
I worked for her family taking care of the children for a few years.
translation.ko: 그 집에서 애들을 돌보면서 몇 년간 일했어요

translation.en: She had eight.
It sure seems to make some people angry when they have so many children.
translation.ko: 애가 너무 많으면 화가 나는 사람들이 있나 봐요

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Hammond were certainly vexed all the time.
translation.ko: 해먼드 씨 부부는 항상 화가 나 있었거든요

translation.en: [Mr. Hammond] Move, scarecrow!
-[Anne] Please, please! [yelps, sobs] -This'll teach ya.
-Mr. Hammond? -[barks]
[yells] Mrs. Hammond! Mrs. Hammond!
-Is anything the matter? -No. Nothing.
I was, I was startled by the geese, is all.
Don't you just love them? The geese? I do.
translation.ko: 거위가 참 좋지 않나요? 저는 좋아하거든요

translation.en: They're a very romantical species of bird.
Well, I wouldn't know about that.
Did you know they mate for life?
They choose each other out of all the other geese in the world,
translation.ko: 그 많은 거위 중에서 서로를 선택해서

translation.en: and they stay together until death do they part.
Well, now...
Uh, we're pretty near home.
Just another mile or so.
"Home."
What a wonderful word.
-Green Gables. -[clicks tongue] Whoa, whoa, whoa.
[Anne] I have pinched myself so many times today.
translation.ko: 오늘 제 팔을 정말 많이 꼬집어봤죠

translation.en: Every little while, this horrible sickening feeling would come over me,
and I'd be so afraid that this was all a dream.
translation.ko: 모든 게 꿈이면 어쩌나 하고 너무 두려웠거든요

translation.en: But I just had to one more time.
translation.ko: 한 번 더 꼬집어볼 수밖에 없었죠

translation.en: This is real.
Green Gables is real and we're home.
Mare. [clicks tongue]
Matthew Cuthbert, who's that?
Where is the boy?
There wasn't any boy.
There was only her.
[Marilla] No boy?
But there must have been a boy. We sent word to Mrs. Spencer to bring us a boy.
translation.ko: 남자애여야지 스펜서 부인한테 남자애를 보내라고 했잖아

translation.en: Well, she didn't.
She brought her.
I asked the stationmaster.
I had to bring her home.
She couldn't be left there, no matter where the mistake had come in.
translation.ko: 누구 잘못이든 애를 거기 둘 수는 없잖아

translation.en: [exhales] Well, this is a pretty piece of business.
-She's gotta go back. -You don't want me.
translation.ko: - 돌려보내야 해 - 저를 원하시는 게 아니군요

translation.en: [gasps] I should have expected it.
I might have known nobody would really want me.
translation.ko: 저를 원하는 사람은 아무도 없을 거라는 걸요

translation.en: Oh, for heaven's sake, child! What are you doing on the ground?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 얘야 땅바닥에서 뭐 하는 거니?

translation.en: Now you listen here and stand up.
-What do you make of this? -I, um...
Because she's traveled a long way to be disappointed.
translation.ko: 그 먼 길을 왔는데 실망만 하게 됐잖아

translation.en: Well, she shouldn't be here. You should never have brought her home.
translation.ko: 쟤를 여기 둘 수는 없어 애초에 데리고 오지 말았어야지

translation.en: -[Matthew echoing] She's had a shock. -[Marilla] She's not the only one.
translation.ko: 애가 충격을 받아서 그래 쟤만 충격받은 게 아니야

translation.en: Enough of this foolishness. Come along inside.
[distant, echoing] I'm speaking to you, child.
Little girl, that's enough now.
Little girl? Little girl!
Little girl?
I wish I was anything but.
There's no point in crying. There's been a mistake, is all.
translation.ko: 착오가 있었던 것뿐이니까 울 것 없어

translation.en: We're not gonna turn you out of doors tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 너를 돌려보내지는 않을 거야

translation.en: What is your name?
What does it matter?
I won't be here long enough for you to remember.
translation.ko: 제 이름을 기억하실 만큼 오래 있지도 못할 텐데요

translation.en: You will mind your manners and answer the question.
translation.ko: 버릇없이 굴지 말고 묻는 말에 대답하렴

translation.en: Please... call me Cordelia.
Call you Cordelia? Is that your name?
Or Penelope.
Penelope has a very tragical ring to it.
What is your name, child?
Couldn't you call me either of those?
My name is Anne.
Plain Anne.
Anne is a fine name.
A sensible name.
Could you please spell it with an "E" when you speak it?
Anne with an "E" looks much more distinguished.
Very well, then.
Anne, with an "E," it's time to come inside.
translation.ko: 끝에 'e'가 있는 앤 그만 들어가자 얼른 일어나거라

translation.en: Get yourself up now.
I knew it.
This is a lovely home.
Why didn't you tell me at the train station that you didn't want me?
translation.ko: 저를 원하신 게 아니라고 왜 역에서 말씀 안 하셨어요?

translation.en: Why didn't you just leave me there?
If I hadn't seen the White Way of Delight or the Lake of Shining Waters,
translation.ko: 환희의 하얀 길이나 반짝이는 물결의 호수를 안 봤더라면

translation.en: this wouldn't be so hard.
-[Marilla] What on earth does she mean? -It's just...
It's just a conversation we had on the road.
translation.ko: 집에 오는 길에 했던 얘기를 하는 거야

translation.en: I'll put the mare in.
[exhales] Take off your hat.
Lay it and your bag on the bench.
I simply don't understand. Were there no boys at the asylum?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼서 그러는데 보육원에 남자애가 없었니?

translation.en: [Anne] There was an abundance of them.
But Mrs. Spencer said distinctly that you wanted a girl about my age,
translation.ko: 제 또래의 여자애를 찾으신다고 스펜서 부인이 말씀하셔서

translation.en: and the matron thought that I would do.
This is what comes of sending word and not going ourselves. Follow me.
translation.ko: 직접 안 가고 전달만 하니 이런 일이 생기는구나 꾸물대지 말고 따라오너라

translation.en: Don't dally.
I'm sorry to disappoint you, but there's nothing to be done.
translation.ko: 네가 실망한 건 유감이다만 어쩔 도리가 없구나

translation.en: We want a boy to help Matthew with the farm work.
translation.ko: 우리는 매슈의 농장 일을 거들 남자애를 원한 거였으니

translation.en: A girl would be of no use to us. Do you understand?
-I can't say that I do. -I beg your pardon?
I don't mean any disrespect,
but couldn't I do the farm chores even though I'm a girl?
translation.ko: 농장 일은 여자애도 할 수 있잖아요?

translation.en: That's not the way of things, and you know it.
translation.ko: 그럴 수 없다는 거 너도 잘 알잖니

translation.en: But couldn't I?
I'm as strong as a boy,
and I prefer to be outdoors instead of cooped up in a kitchen.
translation.ko: 부엌보다 밖에서 일하는 걸 더 좋아해요

translation.en: I don't understand the conundrum.
For example, what if suddenly there were no boys in the world?
-None at all? -Fiddlesticks.
translation.ko: - 한 명도 없이요 - 말도 안 돼

translation.en: It doesn't make sense that girls aren't allowed to do farm work
translation.ko: 여자애가 농장 일을 못 한다는 건 말이 안 돼요

translation.en: when girls can do anything a boy can do and more.
translation.ko: 여자애도 남자애가 하는 거 그 이상으로 해낼 수 있다고요

translation.en: Do you consider yourself to be delicate and incapable? Because I certainly don't.
translation.ko: 아주머니께서는 자신이 약하고 무능하다고 생각하세요? 저는 절대 아니거든요

translation.en: Anyway, since I'm here now, couldn't you consider it?
translation.ko: 어차피 제가 여기 있으니까 생각이라도 해보세요

translation.en: I could not.
And put those fool notions out of your head.
[exhales] Come along. Let's get you washed up for supper.
Oh, good gracious, child! What's happened here?
translation.ko: 세상에, 얘야 왜 그렇게 된 거니?

translation.en: I was pinching myself a lot today to prove that this was all true.
translation.ko: 꿈이 아니라는 걸 확인하려고 온종일 꼬집어서 그래요

translation.en: Well, you're not eating at all.
I can't. I'm sorry.
I'm in the depths of despair.
Can you eat when you're in the depths of despair?
translation.ko: 깊은 절망에 빠졌을 때 뭘 드실 수 있어요?

translation.en: I've never been in the depths of despair, so I can't say.
translation.ko: 깊은 절망에 빠져본 적이 없어서 모르겠구나

translation.en: Well, did you ever imagine that you were in the depths of despair?
translation.ko: 깊은 절망에 빠지는 걸 상상해보신 적은 있나요?

translation.en: No, I didn't.
Well, it's a very uncomfortable feeling, indeed.
When you try to eat, a big lump comes right up into your throat,
translation.ko: 뭘 삼키려고 할 때마다 목구멍에서 뭔가 올라와서

translation.en: and you can't swallow anything.
Not even if it was a chocolate caramel.
I had chocolate caramel once two years ago, and it was simply delicious.
translation.ko: 2년 전에 초콜릿 캐러멜을 먹어본 적이 있는데 정말 맛있었거든요

translation.en: I hope you won't be offended that I can't eat. Everything is extremely nice.
translation.ko: 제가 못 먹어도 기분 나쁘게 생각 안 하셨으면 해요 모든 게 정말 훌륭하거든요

translation.en: I guess she's just tired.
Best put her to bed, hmm?
Fetch your bag and follow me.
[exhales] Well, undress. Quick as you can. Get to bed.
I'll come back in a few minutes for the candle.
Good night.
How can you call it a good night
when you know this must be the very worst night I've ever had?
translation.ko: 어떻게 잘 자라는 말씀을 하실 수가 있어요?

translation.en: Oh, that is a filthy habit!
Daresay a man's got a right to smoke...
when his mind's burdened.
I daresay yours is, too.
translation.ko: 누나 마음도 편치 않은 것 같고

translation.en: Yes, this is certainly a fine kettle of fish.
One of us will have to drive over and see Mrs. Spencer tomorrow, for certain.
translation.ko: 내일 우리 둘 중 하나는 스펜서 부인을 꼭 만나야 해

translation.en: The girl will have to be sent back.
Yep, I suppose so.
You suppose so? Don't you know it?
Well, now, it... seems a pity.
I mean, to send her back?
She's so set on staying.
Matthew Cuthbert, do you mean to say you think we ought to keep her?
translation.ko: 매슈 커스버트 애를 데리고 있자는 말이야?

translation.en: No, no, no. I-I-I...
-No, I suppose not. -I should say not!
What good would she be to us?
We might be some good to her.
translation.ko: 우리가 쟤한테 도움이 될 수는 있겠지

translation.en: I believe that child has bewitched you.
I can see it plain as plain you want to keep her.
translation.ko: 쟤를 데리고 있고 싶은 게 확실한 것 같네

translation.en: She's a real interesting kind of person.
That's one way to put it.
You should have heard her talk, coming from the station.
translation.ko: 말하는 걸 누나도 들어봐야 했는데 집에 오는 길에 말이지

translation.en: Well, she can talk fast enough, and it's nothing in her favor.
translation.ko: 말은 엄청 해대던데 도움되는 건 한마디도 없더군

translation.en: I don't mind the conversation.
I don't like children who have so much to say.
There's something I don't understand about her.
No, she's gotta be dispatched straightway back where she came from.
translation.ko: 아니야, 있던 곳으로 바로 돌려보내야 해

translation.en: I could hire a boy to help me, and, uh, she could be company for you.
translation.ko: 나를 도와줄 남자애를 하나 쓰고 - 쟤는 누나랑 말동무하면 되지 - 난 말동무 필요 없어

translation.en: I'm not suffering for company. And I'm not gonna keep her.
translation.ko: - 쟤는 누나랑 말동무하면 되지 - 난 말동무 필요 없어 쟤는 안 데리고 있을 거야

translation.en: Well, now... it's just as you say, of course.
I'm going to bed.
[Anne] Dearest Snow Queen...
I accept your token offering.
Had I a book, I would press these sacred blossoms between its pages,
translation.ko: 제게 책이 있다면 이 신성한 꽃을 거기에 넣어

translation.en: so that I could be forever reminded of this treasured moment.
translation.ko: 이 소중한 순간을 영원히 기억할 수 있겠죠

translation.en: Nevertheless...
I, Princess Cordelia...
shall cherish this gift always.
translation.ko: 항상 이 선물을 소중히 여길 것입니다

translation.en: -Let my kiss prove my devotion. -[Marilla] What are you doing?
translation.ko: 입맞춤으로 나의 헌신을... 뭐 하는 거니?

translation.en: It's time you were dressed.
I was imagining that this morning was different than what it is.
I was making believe that I was a beautiful princess,
translation.ko: 저는 아름다운 공주고 여기는 높은 돌 첨탑에 있는

translation.en: and that this was my sacred chamber, high in a tall stone spire.
translation.ko: 저의 신성한 방이라고 상상의 나래를 펼치는...

translation.en: Never mind your chatter.
Sorry.
It's just that your gable room and your lovely old cherry tree
translation.ko: 이 박공 형식의 방과 오래된 멋진 벚나무가

translation.en: provide such scope for the imagination.
I've also been wishing with all my might
that you'd tell me that you'd decided that I could stay.
Pack that inside and come downstairs.
We'll be driving to see Mrs. Spencer after breakfast.
translation.ko: 아침 먹고 스펜서 부인을 만나러 갈 거야

translation.en: Put that down at once!
-Did you take anything? -No!
I was only memorizing.
Let me see.
Stop your snooping and come to breakfast.
[Anne] I'm pretty hungry.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에는 배가 고프네요 세상이 끝날 것 같지도 않고요

translation.en: The world doesn't seem such a howling wilderness as it did last night.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에는 배가 고프네요 세상이 끝날 것 같지도 않고요 어젯밤처럼 말이에요

translation.en: I'm glad it's a pretty morning, so we won't be driving back in the rain.
translation.ko: 아름다운 아침이라서 다행이에요 비를 맞으며 돌아갈 일은 없을 테니까요

translation.en: That would be extremely difficult to bear.
It's all very well to read sorrowful stories,
translation.ko: 슬픈 이야기를 읽으면서 자기가 여러 어려움을

translation.en: and imagine yourself living through them heroically, but...
it's not so easy when you're actually woeful.
translation.ko: 자기가 실제로 비통할 때는 그게 그렇게 쉽지 않아요

translation.en: Oh, for pity's sake, hold your tongue.
translation.ko: 자기가 실제로 비통할 때는 그게 그렇게 쉽지 않아요 제발 입 좀 다물어 말이 정말 많구나

translation.en: You talk entirely too much.
translation.ko: 제발 입 좀 다물어 말이 정말 많구나

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Just so's you know, I sent word
translation.ko: 프랑스 애가 추수 때까지 일을 도와줄 수 있는지

translation.en: to see if that French boy is available through harvest.
translation.ko: 프랑스 애가 추수 때까지 일을 도와줄 수 있는지 알아봐달라고 말해뒀어

translation.en: -Gracious me! -I can milk a cow and split wood.
translation.ko: 깜짝이야 저는 소젖도 짜고 장작도 팰 줄 알아요

translation.en: I can wash clothes, iron, dust, sweep and so many other things.
translation.ko: 세탁, 다림질, 청소도 하고 다른 것도 많이 할 줄 알아요

translation.en: There is no end to what I could accomplish.
translation.ko: 제가 할 수 있는 일은 끝이 없단 말이에요

translation.en: I will take care of these dishes for you, Miss Cuthbert. You will see.
I'll do them right.
Be careful with the kettle. It's very hot. Use both hands.
translation.ko: 주전자 조심해라 아주 뜨거우니 두 손으로 잡아

translation.en: I see it clear now. This very idea was folly.
translation.ko: 이제 모든 게 확실하네 정말 어리석은 생각이었어

translation.en: You can't make up a family. Only kin is kin.
translation.ko: 가족은 만드는 게 아니지 혈육만이 가족인 거야

translation.en: Surely you'll be needing Anne more than ever since your husband's passing.
translation.ko: 남편분도 돌아가셨고 앤이 어느 때보다 더 필요하실 거예요

translation.en: [Mrs. Hammond] I don't want her. I'm moving to my sister's, and I got no reason to take her.
translation.ko: 언니네로 들어가는데 얘까지 데려갈 이유가 없어요

translation.en: -We're overcrowded as it is. -I don't need another mouth to feed.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 보육원에는 자리가 없어요 - 쟤까지 못 먹여 살려요 - 제가 도와드릴게요

translation.en: [Anne] But I can help you.
translation.ko: - 쟤까지 못 먹여 살려요 - 제가 도와드릴게요

translation.en: -[sighs] -Haven't I been of help to you?
-Please don't leave me here. -You're not kin.
translation.ko: - 버리고 가지 마세요 - 넌 내 핏줄도 아니잖아

translation.en: I got enough kin. You're taking her back, and that's final.
translation.ko: 내 핏줄만 해도 충분해 얘를 데려가요 얘기 끝낼게요

translation.en: [gasps] I'm so sorry! Nothing's broken!
Oh, you'll never keep me now.
I was never going to keep you.
[exhales] I'll be back in time for tea.
Anne...
-Bye, Mr. Cuthbert. -I...
I didn't say I'd hire a boy to get rid of you.
translation.ko: 널 보내려고 일꾼을 알아본다고 한 게 아니야

translation.en: It was in hopes that you could stay.
translation.ko: 그러면 네가 여기 있을 수 있을까 해서 그랬단다

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll never forget you. You take care now...
Anne with an "E."
Oh, for heaven's sake! [clicks tongue]
My brother is a ridiculous man.
I think he's lovely.
He's ever so sympathetic, and he didn't seem to mind how much I talked.
translation.ko: 인정이 많은 분이세요 제가 말을 많이 해도 개의치 않으시고요

translation.en: In fact, he seemed to like it.
I felt he was a kindred spirit as soon as ever I saw him.
translation.ko: 마음이 맞는 분이라는 걸 뵙자마자 알았죠

translation.en: You're both queer enough, that's for sure.
translation.ko: 둘 다 괴상하다는 거 하나는 확실하구나

translation.en: I've made up my mind to enjoy this drive.
It's been my experience you can nearly always enjoy something
translation.ko: 제 경험인데요 즐기겠다고 마음을 굳게 먹으면

translation.en: if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
translation.ko: 항상 즐길 만한 걸 찾을 수 있어요

translation.en: Of course, you must make up your mind firmly.
translation.ko: 물론 마음을 정말 굳세게 먹어야 하죠

translation.en: I believe this is something that you and I have in common.
translation.ko: 이게 아주머니와 제가 가진 공통점이라고 믿어요

translation.en: [Anne] I wish I was a seagull.
They're the most carefree of all the birds, don't you think?
translation.ko: 제일 근심 없는 새라고 생각하지 않으세요?

translation.en: Look. Wild roses!
Isn't pink just the most bewitching color? I love it, but I can't wear it.
translation.ko: 분홍은 정말 매혹적인 색이죠? 진짜 좋아하는데 저는 못 써요

translation.en: Redheaded people can't wear pink, not even in the imagination.
translation.ko: 빨간 머리는 상상 속에서조차 분홍색을 못 걸치죠

translation.en: Know of anybody whose hair was red when she was younger,
but got to be another color when she grew up?
translation.ko: 자라면서 다른 색으로 바뀐 사람을 아세요?

translation.en: I shouldn't think it likely.
There's another hope gone.
"My life is a perfect graveyard of buried hopes."
translation.ko: '제 인생은 파묻혀버린 희망의 완벽한 묘지 같아요'

translation.en: I read that sentence in a book once.
I say it to comfort myself whenever I'm disappointed in anything.
I don't see where the comforting comes in, myself.
translation.ko: 도대체 어디에서 위로를 받는 건지 모르겠구나

translation.en: Because it sounds so romantic, as if I were a heroine in a storybook.
translation.ko: 그냥 낭만적이잖아요 이야기책 속 주인공이 된 것 같고요

translation.en: [Marilla] You must have gone to school.
[Anne] Not a great deal, although I went when I was at the asylum. I love school.
translation.ko: 많이 다니지는 못했어요 최근에 보육원에서 좀 다녔어요 학교를 정말 좋아하는데 집안일도 해야 하고

translation.en: But in a household with so much to attend to, the children, the cooking, the chores,
translation.ko: 학교를 정말 좋아하는데 집안일도 해야 하고 애 돌보랴 음식 준비하랴 학교에 갈 수가 없었죠

translation.en: it just wasn't an option.
translation.ko: 애 돌보랴 음식 준비하랴 학교에 갈 수가 없었죠

translation.en: Is there a reason why Green Gables is so secluded?
translation.ko: 초록지붕집은 왜 이렇게 외진 곳에 있어요?

translation.en: [Marilla] Reason?
My family wasn't inclined toward idle chatter.
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 쓸데없는 잡담을 좋아하지 않아

translation.en: [Anne] Do you miss your parents terribly?
[Marilla] They lived good Christian lives.
You can't begrudge God for bringing them home.
translation.ko: 두 분을 데려가신 하나님을 탓할 생각은 없어

translation.en: I suppose not.
You suppose not?
Why is it you find yourself an orphan? Well, it happened when I was an infant.
translation.ko: - 어쩌다 보육원으로 갔니? - 아주 아기였을 때 일이에요

translation.en: I'd like to know the circumstances if you've a mind to tell them.
translation.ko: 얘기해도 괜찮다면 어떻게 된 건지 알고 싶구나

translation.en: I don't mind telling stories.
"Somewhere in a far-off land, in a place whose name I do not care to remember,
translation.ko: 이름은 기억도 못 하는 아주 먼 곳에

translation.en: a gentleman lived not long ago.
One of those with a lance, and an ancient shield on a shelf
translation.ko: 선반에 긴 창과 오래된 방패가 있고

translation.en: who keeps a skinny nag and a greyhound for racing--"
-How dare you! -What?
Do you take me for a fool?
Well, it's just a much better story than mine.
I didn't ask for any story, I asked for yours.
translation.ko: 아무거나 얘기하라는 게 아니라 네 이야기를 하라고 했잖아

translation.en: If you can't tell the truth, then I have no time for you.
translation.ko: 사실이 아닌 이야기를 듣고 있을 시간은 없어

translation.en: If you let me tell you what I imagine about myself,
translation.ko: 제가 저에 대해 상상하고 있는 걸 들으시면

translation.en: you'll find it ever so much more interesting.
Wishing something is different than it is will not make it so!
translation.ko: 사실이 아닌 걸 바란다고 해서 사실이 되는 건 아니야

translation.en: Truer words were never spoken.
My parents were Walter and Bertha Shirley.
They were newlyweds, and they were poor as church mice.
translation.ko: 갓 결혼한 두 분은 정말 찢어지게 가난했어요

translation.en: They died of a fever when I was three months old.
So I've been earning my keep for as long as I can remember, and...
translation.ko: 그래서 기억하는 한 저는 항상 제가 벌어서 먹고살았어요

translation.en: I suppose I was lucky that I was placed out,
instead of staying in the asylum.
translation.ko: 갈 데가 있었으니 운이 좋았다고 해야겠네요

translation.en: I never understood it.
translation.ko: 절대 이해 안 되는 게 있어요

translation.en: If children are such a burden, then why do people have so many of them?
translation.ko: 자식이 그렇게나 짐이 된다면 왜 그렇게 많이 낳죠?

translation.en: Nevertheless, it's a shame I'll never have the opportunity.
translation.ko: 저는 아예 기회도 없을 테니 참 안타까운 일이에요

translation.en: What do you mean?
To be one.
Anne!
No! Go home! Go home!
Oh, my Lord!
Are you all right?
-Shh. -Oh, dear Lord!
-I'm fine. Here you are. Shh. -Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
It's all right. It's all right, Belle.
There is no need to worry anymore, Belle.
-Belle? -That's her name.
translation.ko: - 걱정하지 마, 벨 - 벨이라고? 얘 이름이에요

translation.en: -[chuckles] Wasn't that an adventure? -Wasn't it just!
-You're sure you're all right? -Mm-hmm.
You were very level-headed.
I'm used to a ruckus.
My, you're the last folks I was looking for today, but I'm real glad to see you.
translation.ko: 이런, 전혀 뜻밖의 손님들이 찾아왔군요 정말 반가워요

translation.en: And how are you doing, dear Anne?
I'm well enough, thank you.
What brings you by, Miss Cuthbert?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일로 오셨나요? - 스펜서 부인, 그게 말이죠

translation.en: Well, the fact is, Mrs. Spencer, there's been a queer mistake somewhere.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일로 오셨나요? - 스펜서 부인, 그게 말이죠 분명히 착오가 있었는데 어떻게 된 건지 알아보려고요

translation.en: I've come over to see where it is.
translation.ko: 분명히 착오가 있었는데 어떻게 된 건지 알아보려고요

translation.en: Matthew and I sent word for you to bring us a boy from the asylum.
We told your brother Robert to tell you we wanted a boy.
translation.ko: 당신한테 그렇게 전하라고 당신의 동생인 로버트한테 부탁했죠

translation.en: Marilla Cuthbert, you don't say so!
But Robert sent word through his daughter Nancy that you wanted a girl.
translation.ko: 로버트가 딸 낸시를 통해 연락했는데 당신이 여자애를 원한댔어요

translation.en: Oh, that Nancy is a terrible flighty thing.
I've often had to scold her for her heedlessness.
translation.ko: 너무 부주의해서 제가 여러 번 꾸짖기도 했죠

translation.en: I'm dreadfully sorry about this.
It was our own fault.
We should have come to you ourselves, and not left an important message
translation.ko: 이런 중요한 문제를 말로 전하지 말고 우리가 직접 찾아와서 얘기해야 했는데

translation.en: to be handed on by word of mouth.
However, the mistake has been made,
and the only thing to do is to set it right.
I suppose the asylum will take her back, won't they?
I suppose, but it might not be necessary to return her.
translation.ko: 그렇기는 하겠지만 안 그래도 될 거예요

translation.en: My neighbor, Mrs. Blewett,
was just saying to me she's overburdened by her large family,
and she wishes she'd sent for a girl to help.
translation.ko: 일을 도와줄 여자애를 보내줄 수 있는지 묻더군요

translation.en: Anne will do nicely.
I call this positively providential.
We'll call on her and see. I'm sure she'll agree.
translation.ko: 연락해서 알아볼게요 분명히 좋다고 할 거예요

translation.en: -How old are you and what's your name? -Anne Shirley. I'm just 13.
Hmm. You don't look as if there's much to you. But you're wiry.
I don't know, but the wiry ones are the best after all.
translation.ko: 강단 있는 애가 일은 제일 잘하더군

translation.en: If I take you, you'll do as I say, and speak when spoken to.
translation.ko: 내가 널 쓰면 절대복종하고 묻는 말에 대답만 해야 해

translation.en: I don't suffer no backtalk.
If I find you lacking, you'll know the toe of my boot.
I expect you to earn your keep, and no mistake.
translation.ko: 네 밥값을 해야 하고 실수는 용서 안 해

translation.en: I'm at my wits' end with this one. He'll be the death of me.
translation.ko: 얘를 어째야 할지 모르겠어요 사람 잡겠다니까요

translation.en: That's a colic cry.
[Mrs. Blewett] What?
[Anne] He'll do better if you swaddle him.
And gripe water helps.
-Anne has worked for large families. -And work she will.
translation.ko: 앤은 전에도 대가족을 위해 일한 적이 있죠 일은 확실히 하게 될 거예요 여기는 자선단체가 아니거든요

translation.en: This ain't no charity house.
translation.ko: 일은 확실히 하게 될 거예요 여기는 자선단체가 아니거든요

translation.en: I suppose I can take her off your hands, Miss Cuthbert. If you like, I can take her now.
translation.ko: 얘는 내가 맡을게요 지금 당장 보내셔도 돼요

translation.en: W-Well, I-I don't know.
I... I didn't say Matthew and I
translation.ko: 매슈와 제가 얘를 보내기로 확실히 결정하고

translation.en: had absolutely decided we wouldn't keep her.
translation.ko: 매슈와 제가 얘를 보내기로 확실히 결정하고 보내려고 온 게 아니라

translation.en: I... I just came over to find out how the mistake had occurred.
translation.ko: 어떻게 이런 착오가 생긴 건지 알아보려고 온 거예요

translation.en: I'd better take her home again, and talk it over with my brother.
translation.ko: 얘를 집으로 데려가서 매슈와 상의해 봐야겠어요

translation.en: I ought not to decide on anything without consulting him.
translation.ko: 매슈와 상의를 안 하고는 아무것도 결정할 수가 없거든요

translation.en: If we make up our minds not to keep her, we'll send her over to you.
Otherwise, you can assume that she'll be staying with us.
translation.ko: 그렇지 않으면 그냥 데리고 있는 거로 아세요

translation.en: Will that suit you, Mrs. Blewett?
-I suppose it'll have to. -Very well.
Good day.
Oh, Miss Cuthbert, did you really say that perhaps you'd let me stay at Green Gables,
translation.ko: 정말 제가 초록지붕집에서 지낼 수도 있다는 말씀이세요?

translation.en: or did I only imagine that you did?
translation.ko: 아니면 그렇게 말씀하셨다고 제가 상상한 건가요?

translation.en: Yes, I did say that and no more. But it isn't decided yet,
translation.ko: 그렇게 말했으니 이제 그만해 아직 결정된 건 아니야

translation.en: and perhaps we'll conclude that Mrs. Blewett should take you after all.
translation.ko: 결국에는 너를 블루잇 부인에게 보낼 수도 있으니까

translation.en: Well, I'd rather go back to the asylum than live with her.
I keep expecting her to chase after us on a broomstick.
translation.ko: 마녀의 빗자루를 타고 우리를 쫓아올 것만 같아요

translation.en: I would like you to hold your tongue on the ride home.
translation.ko: 돌아가는 길에는 그 입 좀 다물고 있거라

translation.en: I've got plenty to think about.
I'll thank you to keep your questions to yourself till we can speak in private.
translation.ko: 우리끼리 얘기할 때까지 질문은 삼가면 고맙겠어

translation.en: Run along inside. Put your bag upstairs, and put the kettle on.
translation.ko: 얼른 들어가거라 가방 올려다 놓고 주전자에 물 올려놔

translation.en: Yes, Miss Cuthbert.
Oh, wipe that silly grin off your face!
[Matthew] I wouldn't give a dog I liked to that Blewett woman.
translation.ko: 블루잇네 여자한테는 개 한 마리도 못 주지

translation.en: Trouble is I don't know about keeping her.
translation.ko: 쟤를 데리고 있는 게 맞는지 모르겠다는 게 문제야

translation.en: She's an interesting little thing.
It'd be more to the point if she was a useful little thing.
I propose we give her a one-week trial to see how she behaves.
translation.ko: 어떻게 하는지 일주일 동안 시간을 줘보자

translation.en: She has five days.
I'll need a lot of convincing, that's for certain.
Oh, for heaven's sake!
I noticed last night that you threw your clothes all about the floor
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 보니 옷을 벗어서 바닥에다 던져 놓았더구나

translation.en: when you took them off.
That is a very untidy habit, and I can't allow it.
translation.ko: 아주 단정치 못한 습관이야 절대 용납 못 해

translation.en: You must fold your clothing neatly, and place it on the chair.
translation.ko: 깔끔하게 개서 의자 위에 놓도록 하거라

translation.en: I haven't any use for little girls who aren't neat.
I was so harrowed up in my mind last night that I didn't think about my clothes at all.
translation.ko: 어젯밤에는 마음이 복잡해서 옷에 신경 쓸 겨를이 없었지만

translation.en: I'll fold them nicely tonight.
Although, I have been known to forget.
I'm usually in such a hurry to finally get to bed.
Well, you'll have to remember if you're gonna stay here.
translation.ko: 여기 있고 싶으면 기억하는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: You understand that you're on trial, yes?
Yes.
A decision will be made in one week.
Now... say your prayers and get into bed.
translation.ko: 그럼... - 기도하고 자거라 - 기도해본 적 없는데요

translation.en: I never say any prayers.
What?
Well, I said them at the asylum Sunday School. I liked the catechism.
translation.ko: 보육원의 주일 학교에서 하기는 했죠 교리 문답이 좋더군요

translation.en: [exhales] There's something splendid about some of the words.
"Infinite and unchangeable."
It's not quite poetry, but it sounds a lot like it, doesn't it?
We're not talking about poetry, Anne, we're talking about prayers.
translation.ko: 시에 관한 얘기가 아니라 기도 얘기를 하고 있는 거야

translation.en: Don't you know it's a terrible wicked thing
translation.ko: 매일 밤 기도를 안 하는 게

translation.en: not to say your prayers every night?
I'm sorry. I-I-I was never taught to say them.
translation.ko: - 끔찍한 일인 거 모르니? - 죄송해요 - 한 번도 배운 적이 없어요 - 여기 있는 동안에는

translation.en: You must say your prayers while you're under my roof.
translation.ko: - 한 번도 배운 적이 없어요 - 여기 있는 동안에는 - 꼭 기도하도록 해라 - 그러라고 하시면 그럴게요

translation.en: Of course. If you want me to.
translation.ko: - 꼭 기도하도록 해라 - 그러라고 하시면 그럴게요

translation.en: I'd do anything to oblige you.
[exhales] But you'll have to tell me how to say them, for just this once.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 이번 한 번은 어떻게 하는지 가르쳐주세요

translation.en: You must kneel down.
Why must people kneel down to pray?
If I really wanted to pray, I'll tell you what I'd do.
translation.ko: 제가 정말 기도하고 싶다면 어떻게 할지 알려드릴까요?

translation.en: I'd go into a great big field all alone...
or into the deep, deep woods,
and I'd look up into the sky, up up up,
translation.ko: 끝도 없이 펼쳐진 높다란 파란 하늘을 바라보며

translation.en: into that lovely blue sky without end...
and I would just feel a prayer.
Well, I'm ready. What am I to say?
You're old enough to pray for yourself.
Just thank God for your blessings...
and ask Him humbly for the things that you want.
translation.ko: 네가 바라는 걸 겸손히 기도드리면 돼

translation.en: I'll do my best.
Gracious heavenly Father...
That's what ministers say in church,
so I suppose it's all right for private prayer?
Gracious heavenly Father...
I thank Thee for the White Way of Delight and the Lake of Shining Waters...
translation.ko: 환희의 하얀 길과 반짝이는 물결의 호수, 다정한 벨과

translation.en: and for dear Belle and the lovely Snow Queen.
translation.ko: 사랑스러운 눈의 여왕에 관해 감사 기도를 드립니다

translation.en: I'm really extremely grateful for them.
And that's all the blessings I can think of just now to thank Thee for.
translation.ko: 감사 기도를 드릴 축복은 그것밖에 생각 안 나네요

translation.en: And as for the things I want, they're so numerous
translation.ko: 그리고 제가 바라는 건 셀 수 없이 많아서

translation.en: that it would take me a great deal of time to name them all,
translation.ko: 다 말하려면 너무 오래 걸릴 거예요

translation.en: so I shall only mention the two most important.
translation.ko: 그러니 가장 중요한 두 가지만 기도드릴게요

translation.en: Please let me stay at Green Gables.
translation.ko: 제가 초록지붕집에서 지낼 수 있게 해주시고

translation.en: Please let me be good-looking when I grow up.
Yours respectfully, Anne Shirley.
[exhales] There. Did I do it all right?
That'll do for now.
Get into bed, child.
Oh, I just realized, I should have said "amen"
in place of "yours respectfully" the way ministers do.
Do you suppose it'll make any difference?
translation.ko: 그렇게 안 해서 기도가 안 통할까요?

translation.en: I don't suppose it will.
As God is my witness, I will do everything in my earthly power
translation.ko: 신께 맹세코 저를 데리고 있고 싶어지시도록

translation.en: to make you want to keep me. Good night.
God, give me strength to succeed in my quest!
translation.ko: 하나님, 이번 임무에 성공할 수 있도록

translation.en: That will do.
Sorry. I quite like praying.
Well, it's time to say good night.
Good night.
That girl's next door to a perfect heathen.
translation.ko: 쟤는 정말이지 교회 구경도 못 했나 봐

translation.en: God only knows what we're getting ourselves into.
translation.ko: 우리가 어떻게 될지는 하나님만이 아실 거야

translation.en: Anne!
[shouts] Anne!
-She's gone! -Gone?
I'll check the silverware.
Eggs! That's one chore done!
And now I've met all the chickens, so you don't need to make any introductions!
translation.ko: 닭이랑 인사도 했으니까 소개해주실 필요 없어요

translation.en: I've been up since before the sun. I was too excited to sleep.
translation.ko: 동트기 전에 일어났어요 신이 나서 잘 수가 없더라고요

translation.en: And I wanted to start proving to you that I should stay.
translation.ko: 제가 여기 있어야 하는 이유를 보여드리고 싶었거든요

translation.en: It's so easy to love Green Gables, isn't it?
I'll let the milkers out to graze.
I'll have breakfast on soon.
translation.ko: - 곧 아침 준비할게 - 방에 꽃 가져가도 돼요?

translation.en: -May I take these blossoms up to my room? -No!
translation.ko: - 곧 아침 준비할게 - 방에 꽃 가져가도 돼요? 안 돼, 방이나 사람이 꽃으로 지저분해지면 안 돼

translation.en: You don't want your room or your person cluttered up with flowers.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 방이나 사람이 꽃으로 지저분해지면 안 돼

translation.en: You should have left them on the tree.
I felt that way, too. I shouldn't shorten their lovely lives by picking them.
translation.ko: 그렇긴 해요, 제가 꺾어서 얘들 삶이 짧아진 거니까요

translation.en: I mean, I wouldn't want to be picked if I were a blossom.
translation.ko: 제가 꽃이라도 꺾이고 싶진 않을 거예요

translation.en: Wouldn't it be lovely to be a blossom?
Yesterday, you wanted to be a seagull.
♪ And the power and the glory Forever, amen ♪
[chuckles] I like this prayer. It's lovely.
translation.ko: 이 기도문이 맘에 들어요 아주 좋아요

translation.en: "Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name!"
translation.ko: '하늘에 계신 우리 아버지여' '이름이 거룩히 여김을 받으시오며'

translation.en: It's like a line of music.
Just get on with the business of learning it.
"Our Father, who art in heaven..."
Regardless of the outcome here,
you should have something to wear besides that flimsy bit of business.
translation.ko: 그 옷 말고 입을 게 있어야겠구나

translation.en: I have a leftover piece of cotton on a bolt that may do nicely.
translation.ko: 쓸 만한 천이 남은 게 있을 텐데, 그거면 될 거야

translation.en: You're going to make me a dress?
You need something suitable that fits you.
A new dress!
Well, I've never had a new dress, not ever!
translation.ko: 한 번도 새 옷을 입어본 적이 없어요

translation.en: I can't wait to have puff sleeves and ever so many flounces!
translation.ko: 주름 장식이 많이 있고 퍼프 소매가 있으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Think you can adorn it with lace at the cuff and neckline, too?
I don't believe in frills or flounces.
But surely you don't mind puff sleeves? All the girls are wearing them.
translation.ko: 그래도 퍼프 소매는 괜찮으시겠죠? 여자애들은 다 입거든요

translation.en: Puff sleeves are divine.
-Waste of fabric. -Oh.
Well, I-I'm sure if it's a lovely azure blue or willow green,
I'm sure I won't mind if it's...
plain. You're a vain one and no mistake.
Brown is a very sensible color.
I'll need your dress, so I can use it for a pattern.
Let's take these things off now.
Thank you, Miss Cuthbert.
I've very grateful to have something new. Really I am.
translation.ko: 새 옷을 가지게 된 것만으로도 정말 감사드려요

translation.en: I'm sure I can imagine it's fashionable.
[exhales] Shouldn't take me but a day or two.
If it looks just like this one, it shouldn't take you any time at all.
translation.ko: 이 옷처럼 만드신다면 그 정도도 안 걸릴 거예요

translation.en: You run along now and learn the prayer.
Yes, Miss Cuthbert.
"Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy..."
translation.ko: '하늘에 계신 우리 아버지여' '이름이 거룩히 여김을 받으시오며'

translation.en: Puff sleeves!
-Morning, Marilla. -Morning, Rachel.
I brought you some scones.
I felt for sure you wouldn't have time for baking, what with all the hubbub.
translation.ko: 아무래도 빵 구울 정신이 없을 것 같아서 일이 많았잖아

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll just come in and sit a spell, shall I?
Catch my breath.
I've been hearing some surprising things about you and Matthew.
translation.ko: 너랑 매슈에 관해 놀라운 소식이 들리더라

translation.en: I don't suppose you're any more surprised than I am myself.
What an incredible mistake.
[sighs] The mind reels.
Couldn't you have just sent her back? We may yet.
But for now, she's here on trial.
-Trial? -One week.
Matthew is quite set on keeping her.
translation.ko: 매슈는 애를 데리고 있고 싶어 해

translation.en: And I'll admit she's a bright little thing,
but I'll need a great deal more convincing.
I know it by heart, Miss Cuthbert!
Anne, this is our neighbor, Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ko: 앤 이분은 이웃에 사시는 린드 부인이란다

translation.en: Well, they didn't pick you for your looks, that's sure and certain.
translation.ko: 어디... 외모를 보고 고른 건 아닌 게 틀림없구나

translation.en: She's terribly skinny and homely, Marilla.
All elbows and knees. [laughs]
Did you ever see such freckles?
translation.ko: 저 많은 주근깨랑 홍당무처럼 빨간 머리 좀 봐

translation.en: And hair as red as carrots! Dear, dear me.
translation.ko: 저 많은 주근깨랑 홍당무처럼 빨간 머리 좀 봐 세상에나

translation.en: -I hate you. -[Marilla] Anne...
-I hate you, I hate you, I hate you! -Anne!
How dare you call me skinny and ugly!
translation.ko: 어떻게 저한테 마르고 못생겼다고 할 수 있어요?

translation.en: And how dare you call me freckled and redheaded!
You are a rude, unfeeling woman! Well!
How would you like to have such things said about you?
translation.ko: 다른 사람이 그런 말을 퍼부어대면 어떻겠어요?

translation.en: H-How would you like to be told that you're fat and clumsy,
and that you probably hadn't a spark of imagination in you?
And I don't care if I hurt your feelings by saying so.
translation.ko: 제 말 때문에 기분이 상하셨대도 괜찮아요

translation.en: I hope I hurt them!
Because you have hurt my feelings worse than they have ever been hurt before!
translation.ko: 제게 전례 없이 너무나 큰 상처를 주셨으니까요

translation.en: [shouts] And I will never forgive you for this! Never, never!
Anne!
Come back here! Anne!
Well! I never.
It's a good thing you can send her back.
I wouldn't envy you the job of bringing that up.
translation.ko: 이런 일을 처리해야 하다니 네가 정말 안됐어

translation.en: You shouldn't have twitted her about her looks.
Marilla Cuthbert.
You don't mean to tell me that you are upholding her
translation.ko: 방금 그 애가 그렇게 성질부리는 걸 보고도

translation.en: in such a terrible display of temper as we've just seen?
I am not trying to excuse her.
She has been very naughty,
and I'll have to give her a talking-to about it.
But we must make allowances for her. She's never been taught what is right.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리도 걔 사정을 좀 봐줘야 해 걔는 옳고 그른 걸 배운 적이 없어, 너도 좀 심했고

translation.en: And you were too hard on her.
translation.ko: 걔는 옳고 그른 걸 배운 적이 없어, 너도 좀 심했고

translation.en: Well...
I can see now I'm gonna have to be very careful what I say after this...
since the fine feelings of orphans, brought from goodness-knows-where,
have to be considered before anything else.
-Now, now! -Oh, no, no.
I'm not vexed.
Don't worry yourself.
I feel too sorry for you to have any anger left in my mind.
translation.ko: 네가 너무 안타까워서 화내고 싶은 마음도 없어

translation.en: But if you will take my advice,
you will have that "talking-to" with a fair-sized birch switch.
translation.ko: 걔랑 얘기할 때 회초리라도 쓰는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: And get her on the next train out.
Goodbye, Marilla.
[Matthew] It's been quite a spell. She'll make her own way home.
translation.ko: - 나간 지 꽤 됐어 - 알아서 돌아올 거야

translation.en: I could go.
She's in her underthings, so she's gotta come back.
-The girl needs to learn some sense. -[exhales]
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have lost my temper
translation.ko: 린드 부인 앞에서 제가 이성을 잃고

translation.en: and embarrassed you in front of Mrs. Lynde. I hope you can forgive me.
-Are you all right? -Yes.
I'm sorry for worrying you. I needed time to ponder.
translation.ko: 걱정을 끼쳐서 죄송해요 생각할 시간이 필요했어요

translation.en: If you let me stay, I will do my very best not to fly into another temper ever again.
translation.ko: 여기 있게만 해주시면 다시는 그렇게 성질부리지 않을게요

translation.en: I appreciate that you're contrite, Anne...
but the person that you owe the apology to is Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 사과할 사람은 린드 부인이야

translation.en: But she hadn't any right to call me ugly and redheaded.
translation.ko: 그분은 저를 못생긴 빨간 머리라고 부르실 자격이 없어요

translation.en: [Marilla] You say it yourself often enough.
But there's a difference between saying a thing yourself
translation.ko: 혼자 넋두리하는 거랑 남한테 그런 말을 듣는 건

translation.en: and hearing other people say it.
You need to learn discipline.
Just imagine how you would feel if someone told you to your face
translation.ko: 누가 아주머니에게 대놓고 말라깽이에 못생겼다고 하면

translation.en: that you were skinny and ugly.
Remember when we were young, Marilla, old lady Adams said--
translation.ko: 우리 어렸을 때 기억나? - 애덤스 부인이... - 알아

translation.en: -Yes. -That you were gawky--
-Yes. Thank you. -I recall you suffered from it--
I don't say Mrs. Lynde was exactly right in saying what she did to you, Anne.
translation.ko: 린드 부인이 너한테 그런 말을 한 게 옳았다는 게 아니야, 앤

translation.en: -She's too outspoken. -She's a bully.
But that is no excuse for such behavior on your part.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 해도 너도 잘한 건 없어

translation.en: You were rude and saucy, and you must go to Mrs. Lynde
translation.ko: 너도 무례하고 건방졌어 린드 부인한테 가서

translation.en: and tell her that you're sorry and ask her to forgive you.
I could never do that. Punish me any way you like.
translation.ko: 절대 못 해요 어떤 벌을 내리셔도 괜찮아요

translation.en: Shut me up in a dark, damp dungeon, and I shan't complain,
but I cannot ask Mrs. Lynde to forgive me.
translation.ko: 린드 부인한테 용서를 구하지는 않을 거예요

translation.en: We're not in the habit of shutting people up in dungeons.
translation.ko: 사람을 지하감옥에 가두는 일 따위는 없어

translation.en: But apologize to Mrs. Lynde you must.
translation.ko: 하지만 린드 부인한테 사과는 꼭 해야 해

translation.en: And you'll stay up in your room until you can tell me you're willing to do it.
translation.ko: 사과할 마음이 생길 때까지 네 방에 있거라

translation.en: I'll have to stay up there forever, then,
because I can't tell Mrs. Lynde I'm sorry I said those things to her.
translation.ko: 제 말에 대해 사과할 일은 없을 테니까요

translation.en: How can I? I'm not sorry.
I'm sorry I vexed you, but I'm glad I told her just what I did.
translation.ko: 아주머니를 곤란하게 한 건 죄송하지만 린드 부인한테 그런 말을 한 건 후회 안 해요

translation.en: It was a great satisfaction!
In fact, I can't even imagine that I'm sorry.
Well, let's hope your imagination is in better working order by morning.
translation.ko: 그 생각이 내일 아침에는 바뀌어 있기를 바라야겠구나

translation.en: Y-You can't send her back over this.
translation.ko: 이번 일로 앤을 돌려보낼 수는 없어

translation.en: Don't be so sure.
Well, it's...
Well, it's good that, uh, Rachel got a calling-down.
translation.ko: 레이철도 그렇게 한번 잘 당했지, 뭐

translation.en: -Wish I'd been there. -Matthew Cuthbert, I'm astonished at you.
translation.ko: 나도 그걸 봐야 했는데 매슈 커스버트 기가 막혀서 말도 안 나오네

translation.en: And you'll take her up a meal.
When did you ever hear of me starving people into good behavior?
translation.ko: 내가 언제 굶겨서 버릇 고치는 거 봤어?

translation.en: She'll stay up there until she's willing to apologize, and that is final.
translation.ko: 사과할 마음이 들 때까지 앤은 방에 있어야 해

translation.en: How's by you, Anne?
I'm fairly well, thank you. I imagine a good deal, so that helps to pass the time.
translation.ko: 네 감사합니다 시간을 보내려고 상상의 나래를 펼치고 있어요

translation.en: Don't you think you better, um, say it?
Just have it over with?
If I apologize, I'll be fibbing.
It'll have to be done sooner or later, for Marilla's, um...
translation.ko: 어쨌든 조만간... 하기는 해야 할 일이야 그게 말이지 마릴라는...

translation.en: a dreadful determined woman, dreadful determined.
translation.ko: 지독히도 완강하거든 - 지독하게 말이다 - 저도 그래요

translation.en: So am I.
It's, uh...
It's terrible lonesome downstairs without you.
translation.ko: 네가 없으니까 아래층이 텅 빈 것 같더구나

translation.en: I'm not used to the quiet anymore.
The trouble is that the prospect seems humiliating and unfair.
But you're smart enough...
to find the right words, I'm sure of it.
translation.ko: 너라면 알맞은 말을 찾아낼 거다 난 믿어

translation.en: But why should the apology have to come from me
translation.ko: 이 모든 게 린드 부인 탓인데

translation.en: when it was Mrs. Lynde who caused the entire situation?
Well, you know...
I like to think that...
that one fine day, it won't matter a whit to you
what anybody says sideways.
translation.ko: 아무 상관 없는 날이 올 거야

translation.en: You have a good imagination.
I suppose it would be true enough to say I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 죄송하다고 할 수 있을 것 같기는 해요

translation.en: I am sorry I upset Miss Marilla. And you.
translation.ko: 마릴라 아주머니를 화나게 해서 죄송해요 아저씨도요

translation.en: So go and smooth things over, can't you?
Very well. I'll attempt it.
For you.
Now that's good news.
Don't tell Marilla we had a conversation,
translation.ko: 우리 둘이 얘기한 거 마릴라한테는 비밀이다

translation.en: on account of we decided raising you was her department.
translation.ko: 너를 키울지 말지는 마릴라가 결정하기로 했거든

translation.en: I shall carry our secret to my grave.
Whatever you're thinking, Anne...
I hope you're taking this seriously.
Oh, I am. I'm imagining out what I must say to Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마세요 린드 부인한테 할 말을 생각하는 중이에요

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde, I am so extremely sorry! I could never express my sorrow, no!
translation.ko: 린드 부인 정말 말도 못 하게 죄송해요 사전에 있는 말을 다 써도 제 슬픔을 표현 못 할 거예요

translation.en: Not even if I used up a whole dictionary.
translation.ko: 사전에 있는 말을 다 써도 제 슬픔을 표현 못 할 거예요

translation.en: I behaved terribly to you, and I've disgraced my dear friends, the Cuthberts,
translation.ko: 부인한테 한 짓은 끔찍했고 마릴라 아주머니와 매슈 아저씨도 부끄럽게 했죠

translation.en: who may let me stay at Green Gables, even though I'm not a boy.
I am a dreadfully wicked and ungrateful girl,
and I deserve to be punished and cast out by respectful society forever.
translation.ko: 저는 벌 받고 이 사회에서 영원히 쫓겨나 마땅해요

translation.en: It was awful of me to fly into a temper because you told me the truth.
translation.ko: 단지 사실을 말씀하셨다고 그렇게 이성을 잃다니 끔찍했죠

translation.en: And it was the truth. Every word you said was true.
translation.ko: 말씀하신 건 하나도 빠짐없이 다 사실이에요

translation.en: My hair is red, and I am freckled and skinny and ugly.
translation.ko: 저는 빨간 머리에 주근깨투성이고 말라깽이에다 못생겼죠

translation.en: What I said to you was true, too, but I shouldn't have said it!
translation.ko: 제가 한 말도 다 사실이지만 그런 말을 하는 게 아니었어요

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde! Please, please, say you can forgive me.
If you refuse, it'll be a lifelong sorrow on a poor little orphan girl.
translation.ko: 용서 안 해주시면... 가엾고 어린 고아 소녀에게는 일생의 비애가 될 거예요

translation.en: Please, say you forgive me, Mrs. Lynde!
There, there. Get up, child.
Of course I forgive you.
I guess I was a little hard on you, but I'm just an outspoken person.
translation.ko: 나도 심했던 것 같구나 난 말을 거침없이 한단다 내 말에 신경 쓸 것 없어

translation.en: You mustn't mind me, that's what I say.
translation.ko: 난 말을 거침없이 한단다 내 말에 신경 쓸 것 없어

translation.en: Thank you for your kind consideration.
I look forward to never minding what you say again.
translation.ko: 무슨 말씀을 하시든 무신경해지는 때가 오길 바라요

translation.en: -[exhales] -Indeed.
Although, it can't be denied your hair is terrible red.
translation.ko: 네 머리가 끔찍하게 빨간 건 부인할 수 없지만

translation.en: But there may be hope for it.
There was a girl in our class who had hair every bit as red as yours.
translation.ko: 학교에 다닐 때 머리가 너만큼 빨간 애가 있었지

translation.en: Do you recall, Marilla?
But when she grew up, it darkened to a real handsome auburn.
I wouldn't be a mite surprised if yours did, too.
translation.ko: 네 머리 색이 그렇게 변해도 놀랄 일은 아니다

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde, you've given me hope!
I shall always remember that you were a benefactor--
We should run along, Rachel.
-Thank you for your graciousness. -Of course.
She has a queer way of expressing herself. Forcible, like.
translation.ko: 표현하는 방법이 약간 강압적인 듯한데 특이하네

translation.en: I apologized pretty well, didn't I?
I thought since I had to do it, I might as well do it thoroughly.
translation.ko: 어차피 해야 할 거라면 제대로 하기로 했죠

translation.en: Oh, you did it thoroughly all right.
I hope you try to control your temper better in the future.
translation.ko: 이제부터는 이성을 잃지 말고 잘 조절하거라

translation.en: I will. I absolutely will.
Although, apologizing is my new favorite thing. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 사과하는 게 저랑 맞는 것 같기는 하지만요

translation.en: I'm going to prove myself worthy of staying, Miss Cuthbert.
translation.ko: 데리고 있을 만한 애라는 걸 증명해 보일 거예요

translation.en: I've been making a list in my head of all the ways I might be useful to you both.
translation.ko: 어떻게 하면 필요한 애가 될까 계속 그 생각만 하고 있죠

translation.en: In addition to the indoor chores, I'm sure I can help with the outdoors too.
translation.ko: 집안일뿐 아니라 농장 일도 도울 수 있어요

translation.en: I'm much stronger than I look. It isn't too mu...
translation.ko: 제가 보기보다 힘이 세거든요 그렇게 많이...

translation.en: You hired a boy?
But I haven't even finished my trial yet.
There's work needs to be done either way.
translation.ko: 네가 있든 없든 끝내야 할 일이 있잖니

translation.en: How long will you be here?
[French accent] Allô. You must be Anne. -With an "E." -Uh...
Je m'appelle Jerry.Jerry Baynard. Nice to meet you.
translation.ko: 난 제리라고 해 제리 베이너드 만나서 반가워

translation.en: "Baynard"? Foolhardy.
Your surname means "reckless or foolhardy."
translation.ko: 네 성은 무모하거나 신중하지 않다는 뜻이야

translation.en: Charlemagne even named his impossible horse Baynard.
translation.ko: 샤를마뉴는 말 안 듣는 말에게 베이너드라는 이름을 지어줬지

translation.en: I don't know him. Charlemagne.
Of course you don't. He died hundreds of years ago!
translation.ko: 당연히 모르겠지 수백 년 전에 죽었으니까

translation.en: -So, you're living here now? -Yes.
Probably. I... I don't know.
Pretty here.
You're lucky.
I don't remember you from the orphanage.
No, no. I live in town. Big family.
translation.ko: 난 시내에 살아 작은 가게를 하는데 식구가 너무 많아서...

translation.en: We have a small shop, but with so many, some of us must work.
translation.ko: 작은 가게를 하는데 식구가 너무 많아서... 몇 명은 일해야 해

translation.en: Well, if you come from such a large family,
it may trouble your conscience to know that you're displacing my own position
translation.ko: 생전 처음 나에게 가족이 생길지도 모르는데

translation.en: in my very first potential family.
translation.ko: 그 자리를 뺏는 일에 죄책감도 안 느껴지니?

translation.en: I am hired through harvest, so...
I don't think the Cuthberts will need you if I stay.
translation.ko: 내가 있게 되면 넌 필요 없을 거야

translation.en: In fact, if you hand me your pitchfork, I'll be happy to finish your task.
translation.ko: 네 갈퀴를 주면 내가 일을 끝내줄게

translation.en: What's your problem?
You. You're my problem.
All I'm doing is my job. What are you supposed to be doing?
translation.ko: 난 내 일을 하는 것뿐이야 넌 뭐 할 일 없어?

translation.en: My apology was an unmitigated success.
Mrs. Lynde was very pleased.
It's not Rachel Lynde that you need to worry about.
Miss Cuthbert seemed pleased, too.
Now you're talking.
It'll ease Marilla's mind that I've got help.
translation.ko: 내가 일손을 구해서 마릴라도 마음이 놓일 거야

translation.en: Matthew, are you sure you still want me to stay?
translation.ko: 아저씨는 아직도 제가 여기 있으면 좋겠어요?

translation.en: But the thing of it is...
and Marilla won't admit this...
but she's getting older, too.
I'll go right in!
That's a good idea.
Hey, hey.
-Good day to you, Matthew. -William. Checking the perimeter?
Anything I should know about?
I wanted to talk to you about your new acquisition.
translation.ko: 당신이 새로 들인 일에 대해 얘기를 좀 할까 해서요

translation.en: New?
The orphan girl. From Nova Scotia.
Word in town has it that you're keeping the girl?
Well, we're pretty well decided, that's true enough.
I wonder if Marilla and the girl could come to call.
translation.ko: 집에 마릴라와 그 아이를 초대할까 하는데요

translation.en: Her name's Anne.
The girl. And that's... that's real neighborly of you.
I'm guessing that she and your Diana are about the same age.
translation.ko: 앤과 댁의 딸 다이애나가 비슷한 또래일 거요

translation.en: Before we permit our children to associate with your Anne,
translation.ko: 우리 애들이 댁의 앤과 교류를 하기 전에

translation.en: my wife and I need to assure ourselves
translation.ko: 아내와 저는 걔가 우리 애들을 망치거나

translation.en: that she won't corrupt their good natures, or exert any negative influence.
translation.ko: 아내와 저는 걔가 우리 애들을 망치거나 부정적인 영향을 끼치지 않을지 확인해야 해서요, 이해하시죠?

translation.en: I'm sure you can understand.
translation.ko: 부정적인 영향을 끼치지 않을지 확인해야 해서요, 이해하시죠?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah. I understand.
Very good.
-Afternoon tea tomorrow? -Tea tomorrow.
-Excellent. Good day to you. -Mm.
We've got an invitation to tea tomorrow afternoon.
translation.ko: 차를 마시러 오라고 초대받았어 내일 오후에

translation.en: The Barrys.
They want to meet Anne.
I haven't finished the dress. She can't go wearing that. Oh, my heavens!
translation.ko: 옷도 아직 덜 만들었어 저 옷을 입고 갈 수는 없잖아 어쩌지?

translation.en: Who are the Barrys, and why do they want to meet me?
translation.ko: 배리네가 누구예요? 왜 저를 만나고 싶어 한대요?

translation.en: Our neighbors.
A very respectable family.
Hem. Buttons. You'll want to be on your best behavior.
translation.ko: 옷단이랑 단추 - 행동거지를 바르게 해야 해 - 왜요?

translation.en: But, why?
They have two little girls who are very well mannered.
Do they... need help?
Diana is the girl nearest your age.
translation.ko: 다이애나는 너랑 나이가 거의 같을 거야

translation.en: If you stay here, perhaps you two will become friends.
translation.ko: 네가 여기 있게 된다면 걔랑 친구가 될 거야

translation.en: A real friend.
[Anne] Let go! Let go of me!
Shut it! I mean it!
Go get it.
-Hold her down. -Please don't!
-Don't! -Stop talking!
Guess what, Princess Cordelia? We're sick of you and your stupid stories!
translation.ko: 있잖아 코딜리어 공주 너랑 네 같잖은 얘기는 지긋지긋해

translation.en: -Stupid stories! -Liar!
This little mousey made too much noise.
[girls] Squeak, squeak!
But then it got caught in a trap.
So now... no more squeaking!
So, shut your face from now on!
Let's go.
I'm so sorry.
[Marilla] Speak only when spoken to.
No startling speeches.
Anne, what's wrong?
Are you ill?
No, Miss Cuthbert.
I'm fine.
Don't worry.
I'll be as quiet as a mouse.
Um, I don't feel nearly as squashed in it as I did in my old one.
translation.ko: 제 예전 옷만큼 짓눌리는 느낌은 없어요

translation.en: High praise, indeed.
You've got room to grow.
translation.ko: 좀 더 크면 잘 맞을 거야

translation.en: It's so nice to be wearing something new, I don't even mind not having puff sleeves.
translation.ko: 새 옷을 입으니까 진짜 좋아요 퍼프 소매가 없어도 괜찮네요

translation.en: This was mine as a girl, so it's far from new...
translation.ko: 내가 어릴 때 하던 거라 새것은 아니지만

translation.en: but it'll do nicely.
Thank you!
It's so pretty.
You look clean and tidy, and that's what counts.
translation.ko: 깔끔하고 단정해 보이는구나 그게 중요한 거야

translation.en: Oh, isn't this lovely?
-Hand it here. -May I try it on?
That is not a toy.
This is a treasured possession. Do you understand?
I completely understand.
Amethyst is my favorite.
-I think diamonds pale in comparison. -Do you now?
Amethysts are so much more romantic.
Now this was my grandmother's.
My mother bequeathed it to me.
Well, it's perfectly elegant. [exhales] Are you ready to go?
-I'm not sure. -What do you mean?
It's just...
this is a meeting of great auspiciousness.
What if she doesn't like me? Oh, it's her mother you gotta reckon with.
translation.ko: - 저를 안 좋아하면 어쩌죠? - 걔들 어머니 걱정이나 해

translation.en: If Mrs. Barry doesn't like you, it won't matter a whit how much Diana does.
translation.ko: 배리 부인이 널 싫어하면 다이애나의 의견은 상관없으니까

translation.en: Whatever's the matter with you, child? You haven't said a word since we left.
translation.ko: 도대체 무슨 일이니, 얘야? 왜 말을 한마디도 안 해?

translation.en: You're not yourself.
Perfect.
-Good afternoon, Miss Cuthbert. -Afternoon, Mrs. Barry.
translation.ko: - 오셨어요, 커스버트 양? - 안녕하세요, 배리 부인

translation.en: Please, call me Eliza.
And this must be Anne.
Good afternoon.
Good afternoon.
Afternoon.
Thank you for having us, Eliza.
Marilla, Anne, please come in.
I don't believe you said two words during tea.
translation.ko: 차 마시면서 딱 두 마디라니 정말 대단해

translation.en: You didn't even remark on the cake.
translation.ko: 케이크에 대해서도 아무 말 안 하더라

translation.en: Mother let me help her bake it special.
translation.ko: 어머니가 특별한 케이크를 굽는 걸 나도 도왔거든

translation.en: You enjoyed it, didn't you?
The cake was scrumptious.
[Diana chuckles] Scrumptious.
Have you always been shy, or does it come from being an orphan?
translation.ko: 원래 그렇게 수줍음이 많아? 아니면 고아라서 그런 거야?

translation.en: I'm less shy than reticent.
Goodness! There's another 25-cent word.
It's just...
Yes?
I like to read. When I can.
translation.ko: 시간이 되면 책 읽는 걸 좋아하거든

translation.en: I like reading, too, but Mother prefers that I do needlepoint.
translation.ko: 나도 그래 어머니는 내가 수 놓는 걸 더 좋아하시지만

translation.en: Does needlepoint provide much scope for the imagination?
translation.ko: 수를 놓으면 상상하는 데 도움이 돼?

translation.en: I don't think imagination is my strong suit.
translation.ko: 난 상상력이 별로 없는 것 같아

translation.en: Really?
I don't know what I'd do without mine.
translation.ko: 난 상상하는 걸 빼면 시체나 마찬가지인데

translation.en: Life would be an agony. An utter agony.
translation.ko: 사는 게 괴로움일 거야 철저한 괴로움

translation.en: Agony!
I make up stories all the time.
I could never do that.
I like to imagine that I am a princess in a tower,
or Joan of Arc riding into battle,
or a forlorn bride who lives by the sea, but never speaks to anyone
translation.ko: 사랑하는 사람이 바다에 나갔다가 사라져서 유일한 사랑을 잃고 말문을 닫아버린

translation.en: because her one true love was lost
when his ship went down, and disappeared beneath the waves!
translation.ko: 바닷가에 사는 처량한 신부로 상상하는 걸 좋아해

translation.en: [chuckles] Wonderful!
Could you tell me a story now?
-I could tell you 12! -[chuckles]
Diana... do you think you could like me just a little?
translation.ko: 다이애나 나를 조금만이라도 좋아해 줄 수 있을까?

translation.en: I already do!
Shall we swear to be best friends forever and ever?
translation.ko: 평생 제일 친한 친구가 되겠다고 서약할래?

translation.en: It's dreadfully wicked to swear.
No! It's not my kind of swearing. There are two kinds.
translation.ko: 사약 말고 서약 말이야 둘은 다른 거라고

translation.en: I know because I have a worldly outlook. This kind isn't wicked at all.
translation.ko: 내가 세상사에 훤해서 잘 아는데 이건 절대 나쁜 게 아니야

translation.en: It means vowing and promising solemnly.
I swear it does.
See?
-How do you do it? -Well...
Well, this ought to be done by moonlight or over running water...
translation.ko: 원래는 달빛 아래나 흐르는 물 위에서 하는 건데

translation.en: but we'll imagine that it's nighttime, and this path is a stream.
translation.ko: 우리는 지금이 밤이라고 생각하고 이 길이 시냇물이라고 쳐

translation.en: Hold this, and twist your pinky finger around mine.
translation.ko: 이거 잡고 서로 새끼손가락을 거는 거야

translation.en: I'll repeat the oath first.
I solemnly swear...
"...to be faithful to my bosom friend, Diana Barry,
translation.ko: 다이애나 배리에게 해와 달이 있는 한

translation.en: for as long as the sun and moon shall endure."
And then she said it and put my name in.
-And then we sent our oath into the world. -Not in the...
translation.ko: 그다음 우리의 맹세를 세상에 알렸죠 그거 여기서...

translation.en: -Oh! -Sorry! I'll collect them.
It was a wonderful afternoon. I'm so relieved.
It seems you made a favorable impression with the Barrys.
translation.ko: 배리 가족에게 좋은 인상을 준 것 같구나

translation.en: And Diana didn't mind my stories at all. In fact, I told her two,
translation.ko: 다이애나가 제 이야기를 좋아해서 두 개나 들려줬죠

translation.en: and we promised to make up another the next time we're together.
translation.ko: 다음에 만나면 다른 이야기를 만들기로 했어요

translation.en: Diana says she doesn't have much imagination,
but I don't think it matters, since I have enough for both of us.
translation.ko: 그건 상관없어요, 제가 걔 몫까지 상상할 수 있거든요

translation.en: They're hosting a church picnic next week at the Lake of Shining Waters.
translation.ko: 다음 주에 반짝이는 물결의 호수로 교회 소풍을 간대요

translation.en: I've never been to a picnic. Can we go, Miss Cuthbert?
translation.ko: 저는 소풍을 가본 적이 없는데 우리도 갈 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [exhales] We'll see.
Diana and I are kindred spirits.
And I think she'd be struck quite sad if I were to be sent away.
Please take my shawl upstairs, and lay it neatly on my chair.
translation.ko: 내 숄을 위층에 가져가서 의자에 단정히 올려놓으렴

translation.en: May I go outside after and help Matthew with the cattle?
translation.ko: 그 후에 나가서 매슈 아저씨가 소를 돌보는 걸 도와드려도 돼요?

translation.en: I can't wait to tell him everything!
As long as you're helping and not just flapping your gums.
translation.ko: 계속 말만 하는 게 아니라 도와드린다면 그러려무나

translation.en: I'm sorry to arrive so late to the ball, dear Prince Wisteria.
translation.ko: 무도회에 늦어서 죄송해요 나의 위스티리어 왕자님

translation.en: One of my squires returned on horseback after a harrowing journey...
translation.ko: 혹독한 여정 끝에 제 종자 한 명이

translation.en: and handed me a letter that required my urgent attention.
So, please, do not doubt my love.
translation.ko: 부탁이니 제 사랑을 의심하지 말아 주세요

translation.en: And please, please, let the Cuthberts decide to keep me.
translation.ko: 아저씨랑 아주머니가 제발 저를 데리고 있게 해주세요

translation.en: I realize now it's the only thing I truly want,
so you don't have to worry yourself about my red hair.
translation.ko: 제 빨간 머리는 신경 안 쓰셔도 돼요

translation.en: Amen.
-Where is my brooch? -It should be there on your shawl.
translation.ko: - 내 브로치 어디 있니? - 숄에 있을 텐데요

translation.en: It is not.
Nor is it in my jewelry box.
Did you take it?
I was playing with it, but I didn't take it.
-[sighs] You were told not to touch it. -I'm sorry.
It's so beautiful, I couldn't resist.
You were told to set the shawl on the chair.
translation.ko: - 너무 아름다워서 그랬어요 - 의자에 숄을 - 갖다 놓으랬잖아 - 갖다 놨어요

translation.en: I did.
Well, I've looked everywhere. The brooch is nowhere to be found.
Give it back. Right now.
But I didn't take it, Miss Cuthbert. Honest, I didn't.
I don't believe you. Where else would it be?
translation.ko: 못 믿겠구나 그럼 브로치가 어디 있겠니?

translation.en: Confess at once.
But I...
I'm not gonna live with a thief under my roof!
You confess to stealing the brooch, or you have no future here at Green Gables.
translation.ko: 훔친 걸 고백하지 않으면 여기에 더는 못 있을 거야

translation.en: But I didn't take it.
Confess! Or I'll send you right back to the asylum.
translation.ko: - 하지만 안 가져갔어요 - 고백하라니까 아니면 당장 보육원으로 돌려보내 버릴 거야

translation.en: If I don't confess, you'll send me back?
Confess to what you have done!
If I do, can I stay here at Green Gables?
Did you or did you not take the brooch?
[clicks tongue] I lost it.
I-I was playing Lady Cordelia when I took the brooch outside with me.
translation.ko: 브로치를 밖에 가지고 나가서 코딜리어 공주 놀이를 했어요

translation.en: And as I was drawing water from the well,
I leaned over to make a wish and it fell in.
translation.ko: 몸을 기울이고 소원을 비는데 브로치가 떨어졌어요

translation.en: I heard it make a splash, as it disappeared down into the depths.
translation.ko: 물에 빠지는 소리가 나고 그대로 사라졌죠

translation.en: I'm ever so sorry, Miss Cuthbert.
Pack your things.
[voice trembles] But you said if I confessed, I could stay!
translation.ko: 제가 고백하면 여기 있어도 된다고 하셨잖아요

translation.en: I told you that brooch meant a great deal to me.
translation.ko: 그게 얼마나 중요한 물건인지 내가 얘기했잖아

translation.en: No, b-b-but I-I made that up!
translation.ko: 다 사실이 아니에요 제가 지어낸 얘기라고요

translation.en: None of that was real! I didn't take your brooch! I don't know where it is!
translation.ko: 다 사실이 아니에요 제가 지어낸 얘기라고요 브로치는 안 가져갔어요 어디 있는지도 몰라요

translation.en: Please, Miss Cuthbert, you have to believe me.
I don't have to do anything!
Please, Miss Cuthbert.
I can't trust one word out of your mouth.
translation.ko: 네 입에서 나오는 말은 한마디도 못 믿겠어

translation.en: -Please. -Enough!
You're not to leave this room tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에는 이 방에서 나오지 마

translation.en: Tomorrow, you will go at first light.
translation.ko: 내일 아침에 해 뜨자마자 바로 가는 거야

translation.en: Matthew!
Matthew!
Did I miss it?
Did I miss the train?
Oh, not to worry. Your girl got on all right.
translation.ko: 걱정할 것 없어요 여자애는 기차에 잘 탔어요
